about_the_game:
The Ultimate Fireworks Roguelite!

Handheld sparklers, poppers, firecrackers, bottle rockets, and even skyrockets! In Respark, engage in thrilling and intense combat, using all kinds of hanabi (fireworks) to outsmart and overcome your enemies!




Each course is automatically and randomly generated. Not only will the terrain and enemies change, but the important items you find will also differ with each playthrough. Your choices shape your adventure!

Enchanting World and Captivating Music by AAAA!

Set in the whimsical world of Animalia, where animals have formed a civilized society, Respark offers a dazzling experience. The charming visuals combined with AAAA's catchy and wonderful background music create a joyous gaming journey for both newcomers and seasoned players.

Generous Demo Packed with Excitement!

To give you a taste of Respark's magic, we've prepared a special demo! Out of the 8 worlds in the full game, you can explore World 1, 4, and 7! While the demo doesn’t include the storyline or the save/load feature, you’ll still get to experience the thrill of reaching the final phase. Can you conquer the boss of World 7?

Note: The demo version supports keyboard and mouse operation only.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Respark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
